name: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Blocks – correct block size and type for wall
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure CJs are set out and align with criteria in Mott Macdonald
Type of: Hold Point – Wall set out
REFERENCE: Mortar to be class M3 to AS3700 (ST-0091) [A]
○ Mortar – do not use bush sand
○ Ensure sand clean and free from impurities
○ (Vertical) N16-800 Dowel Embedment 125mm min. (600mm min. lap)
○ Dowel to be installed 2nd to last block core either side of CJ – correct ties used
Type of: Hold Point – Embedment depth
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Joint reinforcement in first bed above slab
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: N12-400 Horizontal in wall (500mm min. lap) bars tied in
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: N16-800 Vertical Lap bars tied in – Bar heights marked on wall
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Bond Beam Lintel/Penetration Detail (Y/N)
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Notify engineer to inspect prior to pour
Type of: Engineer required for inspection Y/N
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All reinforcement installed as per spec
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: 20mPa blockfill, slump 225mm, maximum agg size 10mm or grout
Type of: Supplier Compressive Strength Test
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Base cleaned out, core to be rodded to ensure wall is properly filled
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: N16-800 Vertical Lap bars tied in and extend min 100mm into last block
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: MFA 4/1 Head Restraint tie at 800 ctrs
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: 20mPa blockfill, slump 225mm, maximum agg size 10mm
Type of: Test Report – Supplier test cylinder
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All bedding pointing up, mortar droppings removed, work area cleaned
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All nonconformances closed out
